&size(11){&italic(){Prove that the set "Yuzuki Yukari" is a cutting board&br()if the following equations are true&br()Yuzuki Yukari = ｛yukari's body, yukari's tits｝}}

&size(11){&italic(){sin(yukari's body)/[e^x+1]=∞&br()lim +x→yukari's tits&br()｛yukari's body, 0°＜yukari's body≦90°｝&br()｛yukari's tits,0°＜yukari's body≦πi｝}}

&size(11){&italic(){let numerator be Y&br()let denominator be X}}

&size(11){&italic(){the equation is true, if and only if&br()Y∈+R　　and X approaches 0 from positive side　or&br()Y∈-R　　and X approaches 0 from negative side}}

&size(11){&italic(){θ= yukari's body&br()when the value "yukari's body" is substituted into θ、&br()each trigonometric functions f(θ) will produce the values below}}

&size(11){&italic(){sinθ= 1　cosθ= 0　tanθ= undefined&br()cscθ= 1　secθ= undefined　cotθ= 0}}

&size(11){&italic(){the onlyθwhich gives such values would be 90°&br()therefore, yukari's body=90°}}

&size(11){&italic(){with Euler's formula&br()e^(iθ)=cosθ+isinθ&br()e^(iθ)+1=cosθ+isinθ+1&br()cosθ+isinθ+1=0}}

&size(11){&italic(){if 0＜θ≦πi、the only value of variable θ&br()which makes this equation true would be πi&br()&br()therefore, yukari's tits=πi}}
&size(11){&italic(){by the common sense theorem,&br()the only object that satisfies such values would be a cutting board}}

&size(11){&italic(){∴ Yuzuki Yukari is a cutting board&br()QED}}
